text: Hussain Al Hajoj (, born 22 November 1996) is a Saudi Arabian professional footballer who plays as a winger for Pro League side Al-Raed . ==Career== Al- Hajoj he started his career of Al-Ansar in Saudi Second Division and went up with Al-Ansar from the Saudi Second Division to the Prince Mohammad bin Salman League in the 2017-18 season . Al Hajoj left Al-Ansar and joined Pro league Al-Ittihad on October 28, 2018 . left Al-Ittihad and signed with Al-Fayha on a six-month loan on February 6, 2019 . He returned to Al-Ittihad and left again and signed with Al-Adalah on a one-year loan on August 31, 2019 . left Al- Ittihad permanently and signed with Al-Raed on February 1, 2020 . ==References== == External links == * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Saudi Arabian footballers Category:Saudi Arabia youth international footballers Category:Al-Ansar FC (Medina) players Category:Ittihad FC players Category:Al-Fayha FC players Category:Al-Adalah FC players Category:Al-Raed FC players Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Saudi Second Division players Category:Prince Mohammad bin Salman League players Category:Association football wingers
title: Hussain Al Hajoj
